00036 #include "LocalSizeQualityMetric.hpp"
00037 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00038 
00039 using namespace Mesquite;
00040 
00042 static inline double compute_corner_area( PatchData &pd,
00043                                           size_t vert_1,
00044                                           size_t vert_2,
00045                                           size_t vert_3,
00046                                           MsqError &err)
00047 {
00048   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00049   Vector3D vec_1=verts[vert_2]-verts[vert_1];
00050   Vector3D vec_2=verts[vert_3]-verts[vert_1];
00051   Vector3D cross_vec=vec_1*vec_2;
00052   return (cross_vec.length()/2.0);
00053 }
00054    
00056 static inline double compute_corner_volume( PatchData &pd,
00057                                             size_t vert_1,
00058                                             size_t vert_2,
00059                                             size_t vert_3,
00060                                             size_t vert_4,
00061                                             MsqError &err)
00062 {
00063   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00064   Vector3D vec_1=verts[vert_2]-verts[vert_1];
00065   Vector3D vec_2=verts[vert_3]-verts[vert_1];
00066   Vector3D vec_3=verts[vert_4]-verts[vert_1];
00067   return fabs((vec_3%(vec_1*vec_2))/6.0);
00068 
00069 }

00071 LocalSizeQualityMetric::~LocalSizeQualityMetric()
00072   {}

00074 std::string LocalSizeQualityMetric::get_name() const
00075   { return "Local Size"; }
00076 
00077 int LocalSizeQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00078   { return 1; }
00079 
00088 bool LocalSizeQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData &pd, size_t this_vert,
00089                                        double &fval, MsqError &err )
00090 {
00091   fval=0.0;
00092     //get the element array
00093   MsqMeshEntity* elems = pd.get_element_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094     //get the vertex to element array and the offset array
00095   //const size_t* elem_offset = pd.get_vertex_to_elem_offset(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00096   //const size_t* v_to_e_array = pd.get_vertex_to_elem_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00097     //find the offset for this vertex
00098   //size_t this_offset = elem_offset[this_vert];
00099     //get the number of elements attached to this vertex (given by the
00100     //first entry in the vertex to element array)
00101   //size_t num_elems = v_to_e_array[this_offset];
00102     //PRINT_INFO("\nIN LOCAL SIZE CPP, num_elements = %i",num_elems);
00103   size_t num_elems;
00104   const size_t *v_to_e_array = pd.get_vertex_element_adjacencies( this_vert, num_elems, err ); 
00105   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00106   
00107   if(num_elems <= 0){
00108     return true;
00109   }
00110   
00111     //create an array to store the local metric values before averaging
00112     //Can we remove this dynamic allocatio?
00113   double* met_vals = new double[num_elems];
00114     //vector to hold the other verts which form a corner.
00115   std::vector<size_t> other_vertices;
00116   other_vertices.reserve(4);
00117   double total_val=0.0;
00118   size_t i=0;
00119     //loop over the elements attached to this vertex
00120   for(i=0;i<num_elems;++i){
00121       //get the vertices which (with this_vert) form the corner of
00122       //the ith element.
00123     elems[v_to_e_array[i]].get_connected_vertices(this_vert,
00124                                                               other_vertices,
00125                                                               err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00127     
00128     switch(other_vertices.size()){
00129         //if a surface element, compute the corner area
00130       case 2:
00131         met_vals[i] = compute_corner_area(pd, this_vert, other_vertices[0],
00132                                           other_vertices[1], err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00133         break;
00134           //if a volume element, compute the corner volume 
00135       case 3:
00136         met_vals[i] = compute_corner_volume(pd, this_vert, other_vertices[0],
00137                                             other_vertices[1],
00138                                             other_vertices[2], err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00139         break;
00140       default:
00141           //otherwise, there is was an error.  Either the wrong number
00142           //of vertices were returned fom get_connected_vertices or
00143           //the element does not have the correct number of edges
00144           //connected to this vertex (possibly a pyramid element).
00145         met_vals[i]=0.0;
00146         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect number of vertices returned from "
00147                         "get_connected_vertices.", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00148         return false;
00149     };
00150       //keep track of total so that we can compute the linear average
00151     total_val+=met_vals[i];
00152     //PRINT_INFO("\nIN LOCAL SIZE CPP, total_val = %f, i = %i",total_val,i);
00153       //clear the vector of other_vertices for re-use.
00154     other_vertices.clear();
00155     //PRINT_INFO("\nIN LOCAL SIZE CPP, after clean size = %f",other_vertices.size());
00156     
00157   }
00158     //calculate the linear average... num_elems is non-zero here.
00159   total_val /= (double) num_elems;
00160   //PRINT_INFO("\nIN LOCAL SIZE CPP, average = %f",total_val);
00161     //if the average is non-zero
00162     //divide each entry by the linear average
00163   if(total_val!=0){
00164     for(i=0;i<num_elems;++i){
00165       met_vals[i]/=total_val;
00166     }
00167       //calculate fval by averaging the corner values
00168     fval = average_metrics(met_vals, num_elems, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00169     //PRINT_INFO("\nIN LOCAL SIZE CPP, inside if statement");
00170   }
00171   //PRINT_INFO("\nIN LOCAL SIZE CPP, fval = %f",fval);
00172     //clean up the dynamically allocated array
00173   delete []met_vals;
00174     //always return true... the vertex position is never invalid
00175   return true;
00176   
00177 }
00178 
00179      
00180 bool LocalSizeQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00181                                                     size_t vertex,
00182                                                     double& value,
00183                                                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00184                                                     MsqError& err )
00185 {
00186   indices.clear();
00187   pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices( vertex, indices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00188   
00189   std::vector<size_t>::iterator r, w;
00190   for (r = w = indices.begin(); r != indices.end(); ++r) {
00191     if (*r < pd.num_free_vertices()) {
00192       *w = *r;
00193       ++w;
00194     }
00195   }
00196   indices.erase( w, indices.end() );
00197   if (vertex < pd.num_free_vertices())
00198     indices.push_back( vertex );
00199   
00200   bool rval = evaluate( pd, vertex, value, err );
00201   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00202 }
